extension.description:
Responsive Tables

Thank you for buying and downloading this extension!
Responsive Tables is a "new generation" plugin dedicated for Joomla versions 2.5 and above.

With this plugin, you will be able to make responsive any table in your website. This plugin offer you a great implementation:

  • Doesn't break responsive layouts,
  • Doesn't unnecessarily hide data,
  • Still lets you compare rows.

After installation, publish the plugin.
On any data table in your markup, you simply need to attach the classes responsive and rt like that: < table class="responsive rt" > and that's all !
This plugin was successfuly tested on Apple iPhone, iPad, on Android and also on BlackBerry Z10.

Have question or need help about this extension ? Please, ask your questions on our support forum.

You like this extension ? Thanks in advance for your positive review on Joomla Extension Directory.
